org.jasypt.commons
Class CommonUtils

Object
  org.jasypt.commons.CommonUtils

public final class CommonUtils
extends Object

Common utils regarding treatment of parameter values and encoding operations. This class is for internal use only.

Since:
1.3
Author:
Daniel Fernández
